CHAT.comment: Daer Uncle David , I hope you feel good. Will I see you soon? love Chi

Chi decides to write to his uncle although he refers to him as the guy in the hospital. Mot dictates the rest of the letter word for word. Spelling <Uncle David> takes a really long time but the letter goes more quickly after that. Bro is extremely distracting by interrupting constantly and criticizing Chi's work

u.a: BRO's letter was to Grandma and Grandpa
means so he can't say hi ?
BRO has crawled under the table and is trying to tickle Chi
Chi threatens to step on Bro's foot and Mot tells Bro to get out
MOT takes Bro away , Chi left by tape recorder
clearly the EXPs are starting to give up because of the distractions
tv in background , Chi puts period at end of will I see you soon
